select t1.ipgumdate, t1.ipgumid, t1.ipgumtype, t1.ipgumgubun, t1.bankgubun, t1.ipgumperson, t1.ipgumamt, (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid) as sugumamt, (t1.ipgumamt - (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid)) as janamt, t1.branchcode as branchname, t1.salercd as kname, t1.address, t1.conname, t1.conpy, t1.remark from sa_ipgummst t1 where 1=1
and t1.ipgumid = #IPGUMID#
and t1.salercd = #SL_KNAME#
and t1.ipgumdate between #SL_IPGUMDATE_FR# and #SL_IPGUMDATE_TO#
and t1.ipgumgubun = #SL_IPGUMGUBUN#
and t1.bankgubun = #SL_BANKGUBUN#
and t1.ipgumamt like '%#SL_IPGUMAMT#%'
order by t1.ipgumid asc

select saleid ,(select saledate from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as saledate ,(select salegubun from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as salegubun ,(select conname from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as conname ,(select contelno from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as contelno ,(select conaddress from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as conaddress ,(select conm2 from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as conm2 ,(select conpy from sa_salemst where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as conpy ,(select sellamt from sa_saledtl where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid) as sellamt ,(select depositgubun from sa_ipgumscheduletb where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid and ipgumseq = t2.ipgumseq) as depositgubun ,(select depositdate from sa_ipgumscheduletb where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid and ipgumseq = t2.ipgumseq) as depositdate ,(select depositamt from sa_ipgumscheduletb where 1=1 and saleid = t2.saleid and ipgumseq = t2.ipgumseq) as depositamt ,t2.sugumamt from sa_ipgummst t1, sa_ipgumdtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.ipgumid = #IPGUMID# and t1.ipgumid = t2.ipgumid
select COUNT(t1.IPGUMID) AS CNT from sa_ipgummst t1 where 1=1 and t1.ipgumid = #IPGUMID#

CONPY,
REMARK, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( (select concat(date_format(curdate( ), '%y%m'), LPAD(right(ifnull(max(IPGUMID), 0),4) + 1, 4, '0')) from sa_ipgummst b where left(IPGUMID,4) = date_format(curdate( ),'%y%m')), #IPGUMDATE#, #IPGUMTYPE#, #IPGUMGUBUN#, #BANKGUBUN#, #IPGUMAMT#, #IPGUMPERSON#, #BRANCHNAME#, #KNAME#, #ADDRESS#, #CONNAME#,
#CONPY#,
#REMARK#, #USERID#, NOW()
)

CONPY = #CONPY#,
REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE IPGUMID = #IPGUMID#
